subject: Speedskating
lead_paragraph: The Olympic champion Lee Sang-hwa of South Korea won the women’s 500 meters at the speedskating World Cup in Heerenveen, Netherlands, to take the season discipline title.
snippet: The Olympic champion Lee Sang-hwa of South Korea won the women’s 500 meters at the speedskating World Cup in Heerenveen, Netherlands, to take the season discipline title.
